reach.description: the distance at which a melee attack can hit a target

range.description: the distance at which a ranged attack can hit a target

hold.description: the number of hands needed to wield the item

block.description: the chance to avoid an attack by blocking with a shield or weapon

defense.description: the amount of protection the item grants to blunt and sharp damage

offense.description: the amount of blunt or sharp damage a hit causes

weight.description: the amount of endurance needed to wear an item

wield.description: the amount of lift needed to wield an item

enchantment.description: the amount of attunement need to wield the item

price.description: the price to buy the item

rarity.description: the chance to find this item

blunt resistance.description: the amount of blunt damage resisted

sharp resistance.description: the amount of sharp damage resisted

heat resistance.description: the amount of heat damage resisted

cold resistance.description: the amount of cold damage resisted

lightning resistance.description: the amount of lightning damage resisted

poison resistance.description: the amount of poison damage resisted

blunt damage.description: the amount of blunt damage done

sharp damage.description: the amount of sharp damage done

heat damage.description: the amount of heat damage done

cold damage.description: the amount of cold damage done

lightning damage.description: the amount of lightning damage done

poison damage.description: the amount of poison damage done
